name: Out, Damned Spot!
description:
Made for the Public Domain Jam 2 in 10 days, this is an action-stealth game based on Shakespeare's "Macbeth."

(I only quickly tested the webplayer version, so if things are wonky, you'd best download.)

Take the role of the merciless Lady Macbeth and clear the way for your husband (too full of the milk of human kindness, that one) to the other side of the castle, to the sleeping king and the grim deed to be done.

Hit me up on Twitter to let me know what you think!

I've also uploaded a file of all the public domain assets that I used!

I've made my code CC0 (and it's located here), but not all of the assets I used were strictly CC0 - some require attribution. So, if you want to use any of my game, make sure to take a look at my attached asset document.
